review.title: “Good experience”
review.pros: Pros – Nice workplace, good people, undestanding leadership
review.cons: Cons – Not too many carrer Opportunities
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – See that your employees are satisfacted with payment and carrer, to keep then from chasing other oportunities

review.title: “Very Pleasing”
review.pros: Pros – Access to TrainingEasy personal relation with managementGood Work Environment
review.cons: Cons – Not much space to grow, depends on project
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – A career planing should be put into action
